title: ‘They’ve dug through literally EVERYTHING’: Here’s a great thread on that *other* whistleblower complaint
text:
On Thursday night, another alleged bombshell dropped. This time it was a whistleblower from the IRS who was making some vague claims about audits of either President Trump’s or Vice President Pence’s tax returns.

NEW: An IRS official has filed a whistleblower complaint reporting that he was told at least one Treasury Department political appointee attempted to improperly interfere with the annual audit of the president or vice president’s tax returns https://t.co/v5Hp2FktrB — Yashar Ali 🐘 (@yashar) October 3, 2019

So the same bureaucrats who targeted Tea Party groups now have a gripe with President Trump? Shocking. Here we go again. Another so-called “whistleblower” without firsthand information.https://t.co/QBIpahuGwT — Rep. Jim Jordan (@Jim_Jordan) October 3, 2019

We kept an eye on it, but by Friday the story had just sort of evaporated. It did produce, however, a great thread from UndercoverDC editor Tracy Beanz:

I have to write this thread. Stick with me here. There’s a new “whistleblower”, this time from the *gasp* IRS! Already, reports indicate they have hearsay, and already, reports indicate that a member of a committee knew of the supposed complaint a month ago. I’m about to (cont) — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

thread out a number of different things and I hope you will stick with me and wait until the end. In case you haven’t noticed, all of our career, corrupt, politicians are STUNNED that Donald J. Trump has remained a law abiding citizen his ENTIRE LIFE. — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

They’ve dug through literally EVERYTHING at this point- businesses, relationships, taxes, affiliations, his kids and theirs – EVERYTHING – and even a corrupt team of prosecutors spending millions of our tax dollars couldn’t find one SINGLE THING to charge him with. NOT ONE. — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

They even spent THREE YEARS attempting to ENTRAP him into a crime, and failed miserably. They indicted Michael Flynn on a ham sandwich, and still couldn’t get a SINGLE SOLITARY thing on Trump. — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

They went so far as to convince someone who worked for him to plead guilty to something THAT WAS NOT EVEN A CRIME (Cohen- campaign finance) to try to taint him. Nothing has worked. The only thing they even came REMOTELY close with, (and even that is weak as heck) — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

was the infidelity, but guess what?! WE. DON’T. CARE. So, they have to think the American people are complete morons to believe that NOW after three years, we are going to believe that two “whistleblowers” coming forward in a period of a few weeks… — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

after the former corrupt CIA director and a former turncoat sellout told the ENTIRE WORLD that they were planning this would make us blink. Remember when Maddow was all excited about Trumps tax returns? She opened them on live TV and she was all excited, only to find out — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

that our President… paid more taxes than most of the folks in Congress, a presidential candidate who preaches socialism, AND HER OWN NETWORK. At this point you would have to be completely brainwashed to believe that any of this is actually substantive. Right – ALL OF A SUDDEN — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

at the EXACT SAME TIME all of these supposed “noble arbiters of truth whistleblowers” are coming forward with their claims of horrific wrongdoing by the President and his team. This is utter ridiculousness. They are faking polls, they are literally fabricating things out of thin — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

air, they are calling for his first amendment rights to be revoked, the death penalty, solitary confinement, the list goes on and on and on… Want to know why? Because the American CITIZEN is ruining their gravy train, totalitarian plan for domination, — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

and they are scared shitless. In addition to that, and as I’ve said many times before – they would NEVER do this if they thought they were safe. Never in a GAZILLION years. Every single dirty politician is out there accusing Trump of the crimes they themselves — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

committed, and it’s gotten so bad for them that they are now LITERALLY GASLIGHTING people who still watch their irrelevant networks. They tried illegal immigration for votes, that didn’t work. They’ve lost the minority vote and the black vote because these groups are doing better — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

than ever before under our “white supremacist” president who is “literally Hitler” and NOTHING ELSE IS WORKING. They tried beating us in the streets, using their programmed celebrities against us, hijacking music and comedy, boycotts, doxxing, attacking CHILDREN, — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

and NOTHING IS WORKING. Indictments are coming. There are few reasons for this freak out outside of the obvious and this is one. Three years is long enough to have gotten rid of most of the traitors on staff making decisions and another FOUR YEARS of Washington DC cleanup by — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

a law and order, red, white, and blue, AMERICA LOVING PRESIDENT?! They are FINISHED. What you are witnessing is the last gasps of a dying snake that had its head chopped off, flailing around trying to figure out how to save itself. The problem? We are holding its head. — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

Stay strong. Watch for REAL news and information. Inform yourselves. Vote like your life depended on it (it does). Take a victory lap. Because in this battle of good vs. evil, good is winning, and good? It’s all of you. God bless Donald J. Trump and may God bless all of you. pic.twitter.com/hf82IIrpAV — Tracy Beanz (@tracybeanz) October 3, 2019

Boom.

Thank you Tracy! I’m praying you are right! — LWinter (@LilLubbie) October 3, 2019

We think she’s right about plenty of things, although we doubt indictments are coming soon. We’ve been waiting for that for years.

I agree 💯. God is with us and our President. Keep praying Patriots, our Country is at stake.🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 — Nancy Q Wellthenwaritis (@NancymkQ) October 4, 2019

Well said Tracy…and very true…God Bless President Trump for everything he has put up with from these evil deranged lunatics, and God Bless all American loving patriots willing to fight alongside him in this epic battle ! 🇺🇸 — #LisaB🇺🇸 (@kookoobird7) October 4, 2019

#wethepeople say: we are talking about the same IRS who willfully targeted Christian and conservative nonprofits as well individuals. Second hand hearsay. These people are against freedom and seek to remove your freedoms as much as possible as quickly as possible. — Gwell (@Gwell1984) October 4, 2019

I suspect there will be more or these so called whistle blowers – it’s all BS, but it will confuse the general public especially all those who just get drive by news..if they get multiple of these going it could just clog things up. It ruining it for TRUE whistle blowers..sad — N Smith 💎 (@lobsterboy98) October 4, 2019

Well said Tracy , it’s hard to keep our hopes up during these times , but this gives me a little faith that every single one will be held accountable! — Angela (@acmom62) October 4, 2019

This thread is as good as it gets. 😍🇺🇸👍 — John (@john_jjsjr) October 4, 2019

I haven't heard a word about a blue wave this election cycle. — michael❌ (@hebaisgood) October 4, 2019

This…. This right here pic.twitter.com/sEVg1f0fBb — Amanda Lindsay (@AmandaNLindsay1) October 4, 2019

Open the floodgates. The Dems know how to shoot themselves in the foot yet again. Odd, that they are so anti-gun. — Richard Danna (@rickdanna4719) October 4, 2019

Man I love this thread. God Bless America💓🇺🇸WWGOWGA — AnnBobby⭐⭐⭐ (@AnnBobby6) October 4, 2019

Related:
description: We have a feeling we're going to be seeing a lot of whistleblower complains all of a sudden.
